thread.title: A cookie dough café is gracing our planet with its presence
thread.title_full: A cookie dough café is gracing our planet with its presence

author: Caitlin Gallagher
title: A cookie dough café is gracing our planet with its presence
text:
A cookie dough café is gracing our planet with its presence Welp, we have our new dream vacation destination. And no, it’s not sightseeing in Europe or soaking up sun on an island — it’s visiting a cookie dough café in New York City . The new store from DŌ , Cookie Dough Confections, is opening up on Wednesday, January 25th at 1 p.m. ET in Greenwich Village and you should probably already be salivating at the mere idea of this magical eatery.
While the company DŌ isn’t new , its storefront will be a gift to dessert lovers everywhere. DŌ was created by Kristen Tomlan and focuses exclusively on cookie dough products that can be safely consumed raw. Although you could order these delicious-looking desserts online already, seeing them in person might actually make you swoon.
Friday feels thanks to @grubstreet and @melissa_hom. The new shop is opening next week! Who else could use one of these today?? #cookiedough #cookies #baking #nutella #opening #newshop #yummy #foodie #nyc #greenwichvillage #desserts #sweettooth #yum #stuffed #foodstagram #love #cookie 
A photo posted by DŌ, Cookie Dough Confections™ (@cookiedonyc) on Jan 20, 2017 at 8:24am PST 
Like many of us, Tomlan is a sucker for cookie dough, so she came up with the idea of using a pasteurized egg product and heat-treated, ready-to-eat flour in her cookie dough so there is no risk of food-borne illnesses like salmonella. That means you can eat all the raw cookie dough you want!
While that doesn’t necessarily make her yummy products completely guilt-free, it definitely adds to their allure. Just look at these cookie dough tubs! Dough you love me or nah? ♥️ Tag someone who needs to get this for you for V-Day! #cookiedonyc #cookiedough #cookies #foodie #yummy #cookie #baking #valentinesday #vday #xoxo #sweettooth #sweets #foodstagram #food #tbt 
A photo posted by DŌ, Cookie Dough Confections™ (@cookiedonyc) on Jan 19, 2017 at 6:53am PST 
Or the ice cream sanDŌwich! Found my NYE date ☑️ #cookiedonyc #cookiedough #icecream #dessert #foodie #yummy #bluemarblebk #cookies #yummy #nye #newyears #2017 # # 
A photo posted by DŌ, Cookie Dough Confections™ (@cookiedonyc) on Dec 30, 2016 at 11:55am PST 
We told you your mouth would be watering.
If you live near New York City, then you know where you need to be on January 25th. And if not, we won’t judge you for scheduling your next vacay around these cookie dough desserts .
